scripts.check-updates: pnpx npm-check-updates -u && pnpm --recursive exec pnpx npm-check-updates -u
scripts.clean:node: pnpm --recursive exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.link: pnpm link --global @openapi-generator-plus/core @openapi-generator-plus/types @openapi-generator-plus/utils @openapi-generator-plus/indexed-type @openapi-generator-plus/testing && pnpm --recursive --workspace-concurrency=1 exec pnpm link --global
scripts.release: pnpm clean && pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpx changeset publish && pnpm install
